content: TWO LOTS UP FOR AUCTION COIN NUMBERS 12,13 THE COINS SIZE IS 50MM THE MATERIAL IS BRASS AND THEY ARE FUNDED WITH 0.001 BTC THE COIN HAS HALLOWEEN SCENERY ON THE FRONT WITH A BITCOIN FULL MOON, AND A WEREWOLF ON THE BACK"  13 COINS WERE MADE IN TOTALhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gUe2PQZnY48LOT 1LOT 2STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.001 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002 BTCEND TIME: OCTBOBER 20th, 2023, 15:00:00 PDT**PAYMENT DUE 24 HOURS AFTER AUCTION ENDS**PAYMENT ADDRESS: 3Q6xqVmawb3B176vvzkZUdUgxDyst9Z1yZSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.SHIPPING: $10 USD IF YOUR IN THE USA! IF OUTSIDE THE USA I WILL SHIP TO MINERJONES AND HE CAN RESHIP TO YOUR COUNTRY FEES WILL VARY DEPENDING ON LOCATION

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: Quote from: goldlyre on October 19, 2023, 04:06:48 AM15:00 PDT is more friendly than 14:00 for us staying in the Far East countries.  14:00 PDT equals 05:00 o'clock early in the morning in my country.Sometimes I was alarmed by alarmclock and got up at half past four, in order to participatein an auction, but only for a small item. It's hard,  isn't it?

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Just trying to catch an auction period , doesn’t matter what time it is. Life gets in the way. I use an app on my iPhone called “countdown” it’s free but you have to pay a few bucks extra to have the upgraded version that counts don’t to the min, not just the day. But getting up early in the a.m. I have respect for you overseas people. I love checking this page and seeing all the new auctions and conversations
